description:
Two masks often used on maps to indicate a theatre, these originate in Greek Theatre as masks of tragedy and comedy.

One mask frowns, the other smiles.

This emoji tends to spike in popularity around the Academy Awards (Oscars) ceremony.
apple_vendor_description: The performing arts emoji on Apple devices presents a dynamic duo of theatrical masks, one conveying comedy and the other tragedy, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. Each mask boasts a smooth gradient, with the comedic mask sporting a cheerful, upturned smile and the tragic mask a somber frown, all framed by soft, rounded edges.  This emoji, with its rich, jewel-toned coloring and realistic lighting, beautifully encapsulates the essence of theater, drama, and the performing arts, often used to signify an interest in or engagement with these expressive fields.
